content.html: The reason why I shared that ancient blog post is to show just how little I've changed in… EIGHTEEN YEARS! Still have three monitors, still have an ergonomic keyboard and mouse, still have a messy desk.
content.value:
The reason why I shared that ancient blog post is to show just how little I've changed in… EIGHTEEN YEARS!

Still have three monitors, still have an ergonomic keyboard and mouse, still have a messy desk.

photo.alt: A vertical monitor, a laptop, and a side monitor.

content.html: Upgrading to a standing desk today. Cant decide whether to get rid of my 3rd screen (on the right). I rarely use it any more. But it is physically larger than my laptop screen. Albeit at a lower resolution. Thoughts?
content.value:
Upgrading to a standing desk today. Cant decide whether to get rid of my 3rd screen (on the right).
I rarely use it any more.
But it is physically larger than my laptop screen.
Albeit at a lower resolution.
Thoughts?
